#Parameter	Value
input.pom	'./Output/Mutations/pointMutations_B.txt'
input.pomA	'./Output/Mutations/pointMutations_A.txt'
input.cna	'./Output/Mutations/CNAs.txt'
input.cloneout	'./Output/cloneout.txt'

output.VAF	'./Output/VAF/VAF.txt'
output.ForVAF	'./Output/VAF/ForVAF.txt'

tumor_content	c(1.0, 0.8, 0.6, 0.4)
time	c(1, 10, 20, 600)
